name: Entity Stats (Lua)
description: Generate statistics and analytics about entities in the project
author: VS Write Team

tools.name: entity_stats
tools.description: Generate comprehensive statistics about entities in the project

include_mentions.description: Include mention counts per entity. Defaults to true.

include_distribution.description: Include distribution across sections. Defaults to true.

tools.name: entity_frequency
tools.description: Get the most or least frequently mentioned entities

top.description: Number of top entities to show. Defaults to 10.

order.description: Sort by most or least frequent. Defaults to 'most'.

tools.name: entity_coverage
tools.description: Identify entities that may need more coverage or are over-represented

threshold_low.description: Mentions below this are 'under-covered'. Defaults to 2.

threshold_high.description: Mentions above this are 'over-covered'. Defaults to 20.
